data.client_settings: Release Channel: ptb, Build Number: 7441, Version Hash: b10f6907b1bd17e7668f1e0f36b2c3788e8a4fe9
data.actual_result: Discord thinks I'm AFK, and moves me to the specified channel

data.short_description: Discord doesn't take controller activity into account for AFK
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a game with a DXInput controler (e.g a Wired XBox 360 Controller) - eventually get moved to the AFK channel
